name: Steven's Journey
description:
Follow Steven’s gentle voyage through colour and sound. Despite a broken wing, he has been given a new way to migrate. Guide his adventure through land, sky, and seascapes as he floats towards his family.

This game features a two-tier procedural original soundtrack that evolves based on Steven's altitude.

Created over 48 hours during the Ljubljana Ludum Dare Game Jam 2018.

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe to move in any given direction.
Steve must reach his family on the east, but the clouds won't make it easy!

CREDITS:

  • Àdam Carballo - Developer (Web)
  • Ethan Grant - Game Designer (Web)
  • Luka Rous - Sound Design (Soundcloud)
  • Teja Gerkman - Artist (Portafolio)
